body_html:
I have the same issue with tensor flow installed in virtualenv.
I have installed Pillow via pip but it didn't solve the issue.
I can use '' from PIM import Image '' in my Terminal interpreter but not in a Jupyter notebook.

body:
I have the same issue with tensor flow installed in virtualenv.
I have installed Pillow via pip but it didn't solve the issue.
I can use '' from PIM import Image '' in my Terminal interpreter but not in a Jupyter notebook.
